str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: To kindle, light. A primary verb; properly, to fasten to, i.e. to set on fire.
Fire; the heat of the sun, lightning; fig: strife, trials; the eternal fire. A primary word; 'fire'.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Middle, in the middle, between, in the midst of. From meta; middle (neuter) noun).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the same as aer; a yard; by implication, a mansion.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: To cause to sit down with, sit down together. From sun and kathizo; to give a seat in company with.
Peter, a Greek name meaning rock. Apparently a primary word; a rock; as a name, Petrus, an apostle.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To sit, be seated, enthroned; I dwell, reside. From kata; and hemai; to sit down; figuratively, to remain, reside.
Middle, in the middle, between, in the midst of. From meta; middle (neuter) noun).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
